email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out from Maritime Trade Services to offer a shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms.

We have the vessel SEA HORIZON available for this route, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-05. The initial freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 24.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-05. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 2023-11-01, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Charterers
